pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Collapsible Tree Diagrams using 'D3.js' // Interactive Reingold-Tilford tree diagrams created using 'D3.js', where every node can be expanded and collapsed by clicking on it. Tooltips and color gradients can be mapped to nodes using a numeric column in the source data frame. See 'collapsibleTree' website for more information and examples.
